card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to Lucky Number. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to Lucky Number. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

card.title: Welcome
card.text: You are given three boxes each with a distinct number on it. Which box would you like to open?

voice.intro: You are given three boxes, each with a distinct number on it. Which box would you like to open?

card.title: You lose
card.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "start again." Otherwise you can say "exit skill."

voice.intro: You lose. Better luck next time.

card.title: Secret Box
card.text: Congratulations, you've found a secret box. You look around and see a single box with a star on it.
